Thursday, May 1, 2025.Breakfast: Lemon-Ricotta Pancakes – Fluffy pancakes, warm blueberry compote, maple syrup, turkey bacon
Thursday, May 1, 2025.Dinner: Brazilian Steak Bowls: Grilled steak served over rice, black beans, sautéed vegetables, and chimichurri sauce

Friday, May 2, 2025.Breakfast: Avocado Toast Plate – Sourdough topped with smashed avocado, poached egg, chili flakes; side of mixed-berry fruit cup
Friday, May 2, 2025.Dinner: Tuscan Grilled Pork Chops: Grilled chops served with rosemary potatoes, sautéed greens, and white bean salad

Saturday, May 3, 2025.Breakfast: Buttermilk Biscuits & Sausage Gravy – Two biscuits under peppered turkey-sausage gravy, side scramble of eggs with chives
Saturday, May 3, 2025.Dinner: Chicken Biscuit Casserole: Rich chicken casserole topped with biscuits, served with simple mixed greens salad

Sunday, May 4, 2025.Breakfast: Blueberry-Oat Muffins & Yogurt – Two homemade muffins, vanilla yogurt dip, fresh melon wedges
Sunday, May 4, 2025.Dinner: Chicken Linguine Amalfitana: Pasta bowls filled with linguine tossed with chicken, cherry tomatoes, garlic, and lemon, alongside warm bread

Monday, May 5, 2025.Breakfast: Cobb Salad (Lunch) – Romaine, grilled chicken, avocado, egg, bacon, cherry tomatoes, blue-cheese crumbles; vinaigrette
Monday, May 5, 2025.Dinner: Vegetable Minestrone Dinner: Hearty bowls of vegetable minestrone served with crusty bread, parmesan cheese for sprinkling, and a leafy green salad

Tuesday, May 6, 2025.Breakfast: Chicken Caesar Wrap (Lunch) – Grilled chicken, romaine, shaved parmesan, light Caesar dressing; apple slices
Tuesday, May 6, 2025.Dinner: Risotto Primavera: Creamy vegetable risotto with asparagus, peas, and lemon zest, served alongside warm garlic-herb focaccia
